projects.title: AI Interview Feedback Bot
projects.description: An AI-powered mock interview system that uses job role prediction from resume, dynamic question generation, voice-based interaction, and adaptive feedback. The system behaves like a real interviewer with randomly assigned personalities.

projects.title: SightSpeak - Virtual Assistant for the Visually & Hearing Impaired
projects.description: A computer vision-based assistant that uses real-time object detection, OCR, and scene captioning to describe the surroundings through audio. Future updates include sign language recognition and lip reading for the hearing impaired.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A dynamic portfolio website to showcase AI projects, skills, and GitHub integrations. Designed to reflect personal brand with clean UI and responsive frontend.

projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction
projects.description: A machine learning model that predicts whether a customer will churn based on usage behavior and service history. Includes feature engineering, model optimization (GridSearchCV), and deployment using Streamlit.

projects.title: Sales Data Dashboard (Power BI)
projects.description: An interactive Power BI dashboard built on a fictional sales dataset. Visualizes KPIs like total revenue, region-wise performance, product categories, and monthly trends using slicers and drill-downs.
